description: JOHN SPENCER SQUARE No.119 TPO 1991.Tree works at front and rear subject to Tree Preservation Order. WORKS: LIMES(T2 T3) - crown lift 3m  crown thin 35%  cut back from building by 2m.LIMES(T4 T5) - desucker and deadwood. CHESTNUTS(T8 T9) & SYCAMORE(T14) - deadwood.  LIME(T13) - crown lift 3m.  crown thin 35% and deadwood  SYCAMORE(T10) - crown lift 3m.  crown thin 35%  clear building by 3m.  deadwood. CHERRY(T7) - crown thin 30% and deadwood. MAPLE(T6)  HORNBEAM(T12) CHERRY(T15) - no action. MAPLE(T16) - crown lift 3m. crown thin 20%. OAK(T17) - crown lift 3m.  crown thin 25% and deadwood. ROWAN(T18) - no action.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
